synopsis.text:
Tsukishi Ootani and Anna Mikado reunite with coach Zhao Jin Yun to assemble Inazuma Japan, a team of talented soccer players from previous Inazuma Eleven series. This new squad, featuring the likes of Shuuya Gouenji, Ryouhei Haizaki, Tatsuya Kiyama, Yuuma Nosaka, Yuuichirou Mansaku, Noboru Sakanoue, and goalkeeper Mark Evans, is set to compete against formidable opponents from around the world in the prestigious Football Frontier International tournament.

As the tournament commences, Asuto Inamori and his Raimon Junior High School teammates discover that they are up against far more powerful forces than they ever imagined. The mysterious team Orion's Apostle poses a threat not only to their victory but also to the very essence of soccer itself.

With the enigmatic newcomer Ichihoshi Mitsuru joining their ranks, Inazuma Japan must rise to the challenge and defend the world of soccer in their most daunting battle yet. Prepare for thrilling matches, unexpected twists, and a heartwarming reunion with beloved characters in Inazuma Eleven: Orion no Kokuin.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
